title: IEMidi
description: IEMidi is a simple, open-source MIDI editor that leverages RtMidi for its MIDI message handling. The editor is designed to map any MIDI message to various actions such as volume control, mute, console commands or opening files. It also includes a MIDI logger for monitoring MIDI messages in real-time.

title: Interactive Echoes
description: A collection of apps and library repositories under the Interactive Echoes (IE) brand, providing various audio and general-purpose tools.

title: 3D Audio and Gameplay Programming
description: A series of audio enhancements and gameplay mechanics programmed in UE5 and C++. This sandbox project includes a video explanation of each feature, accompanied by the corresponding C++ code.
